title: Full-Stack Developer
description:
We are seeking a talented Full-Stack Developer (Senior, Junior, Intern) to join our innovative team. Work on Odoo ERP implementations and diverse projects across retail, manufacturing, and restaurants.

Responsibilities:
- Design, develop, and maintain web applications using Python, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.
- Collaborate on Odoo ERP implementations, customizing modules and integrations.
- Participate in the full software development lifecycle.
- Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues.
- Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code.
- Work with cross-functional teams.

Qualifications:
- Proficient in Python and JavaScript.
- Strong experience with HTML and CSS.
- Familiarity with Odoo ERP is a plus.
- Knowledge of PostgreSQL or other DBMS.
- Experience with Git.
- API integrations (REST, XML-RPC) preferred.
- Knowledge of Linux/Unix.
- Strong problem-solving and communication skills.

Nice to have:
- Agile methodologies (Scrum/Kanban).
- Mobile app development (Flutter/React Native).

What's great in the job?
- Diverse project experience.
- Collaborative environment.
- Career growth opportunities.
- Impactful work.
- Learning culture.
